content:
Air Intelligence of Border Guards of the Kherson detachment continues to detect and destroy Russian equipment.

About thisinformsState Border Service of Ukraine.

"In the intelligence of the temporarily occupied area of the area, the defenders of the south came across the enemy howitzer" D-30 ", which actively worked in Ukrainian settlements,"-the message reads.

It is noted that the border guards forced the deadly piece of iron to silence forever.

“The hostile howitzer has received the status of“ liquidated ”. We purify Ukrainian land from the invaders, ”the State Tax Service was added.

Recall in the east our warriorsDestroyed640 invaders, 8 tanks and almost 400 UAVs of the invaders.

As reported by the Armyinform, Defense ForcesDestroyedAnother Russian Mur-M surveillance complex.
title: In the south, the Russian howitzer received the status of "liquidated"
description: It is reported by the State Border Service of Ukraine. «Exercise temporarily ...
author: Army Inform
